name: octagonical
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
octagonical is a new crochet a-long starting in october 2020

each part will be published on my website [here][1]

for all the information you will need to join in please go to the intro post on my website [here][2]

**to download the pdf** for each part of the pattern you will need to follow the links above to my website, and then scroll to the bottom of the page - choose option - select and add to basket.
from basket go to check out - complete checkout - you will then have an order window open with the downloads [underlined on the righthand side] and an email is sent to you, and, if you are a free or monthly member make sure you are signed in and then everything is saved to your dashboard under orders then view - download.

this is a free pattern with full video support [us terms]



  [1]: https://crystalsandcrochet.com/product-category/crochet-a-long/octagonical/
  [2]: https://crystalsandcrochet.com/product/introducing-octagonical
